title: The Devil All The Time
writer: Antonio Campos, Paulo Campos, Donald Ray Pollock
short_cast: Tom Holland, Bill Skarsgård, Riley Keough, Robert Pattinson, Mia Wasikowska, Jason Clarke, Sebastian Stan, Haley Bennett, Harry Melling, Eliza Scanlen
cast: Tom Holland, Bill Skarsgård, Riley Keough, Robert Pattinson, Mia Wasikowska, Jason Clarke, Sebastian Stan, Haley Bennett, Harry Melling, Eliza Scanlen

desc: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.
